Posts.Content: May 12, 2011 04:35PM bayarea419 wrote: I have fibrocystic breasts.  The last time my Dr examined me she said, "Oh, you poor thing."  LOL  Besides the pain and having to have ultrasounds after mamos they have not caused problems.  My last mamo was so painful they couldn't do it so my Dr. switched me to MRI's.   I didn't have any trouble with approvals.  Maybe just ask your doctor about it?
